Description:
Lucius II: The Prophecy - three-dimensional horror-adventure game, the plot continuation of the previous parts. We play for the boy Lucius received supernatural powers from Lucifer. Our goal is to kill as many as possible using different methods and progress through the story.
After the events of the first part, in Lucius II: The Prophecy we are already in a psychiatric hospital of St.. Benedict. Our forces were selected by his father - Lucifer and therefore, through the already known to us the way we need to restore them. During the game you can travel both in the hospital and in the small town Lyudblou. The number of possible victims has about 100. Also, by choosing their own abilities, you can customize your character..
Features RePack:
It is based on a licensed version of the game. 
Do not cut / no recoded
